How do you call yourself an entertainer or entrepreneur when no body Knows Who you are? We can HelpNOW YOU CAN WATCH US ON LINE @ ChannelLiveTV.com or get The DVD and watch us on your TV @ HOME or in the CAR,Mobile Phones find out how you can be apart of this EXPERIENCE, contact us today @ the New York Office 212.202. 1988 / 646.395.1112
lenders.occupational_info: ChannelLiveTV, Network 125 mission is to be a reference point and an information medium for people of color working towards a career in the arts and the entertainment industry.  Connecting community oriented businesses to create a supportive foundation for the artist and to use the arts as an instrument to build a strong community.  Based on a report done by Kendra Al-Kaleem, entitled Television News Images of African American & Their Effects on Self-Esteem.  It included that “there are great benefits in broadening the scope through which African American community life is viewed.  An image is a picture that triggers visual recognition and thus a relationship to (in this case, the newscast) product.  The implementation of creating new images that garner positive recognition of urban Americans will create a more, well-rounded, local and national audience in the face of  the new global economy and community.  As technology brings the world closer a clearer understanding of urban America is critical as they continue to grow economically, politically, and socially.

lenders.occupational_info:
I manage public sector housing in a wee bit of Scotland. Elsewhere this form of housing is known as Council housing, Housing Association housing, affordable housing or public sector housing. These days, this sector largely (though not exclusively) exists to assist the more disadvantaged in society, such as the homeless and those on limited income, though this was not always the case.

All this aside, disadvantage is all relative, as the KIVA site very clearly shows. 

But, if you are interested to find out more about this field of work, and housing is about creating sustainable communities, not just solely about bricks and mortar, (though that is a start if you have no shelter at all), then check out the professional body for housing, the Chartered Institute of Housing.

 It covers those working in or with an interest in this area based in Scotland, England, the rest of the UK and further afield (20 countries on five continents at the latest count in total). 

The Chartered Institute of Housing website can be found at  www.cih.org.

lenders.loan_because: I'm a Christian on a low wage for my country and this is an easy way for me to help by loaning money I have saved for next year etc, where I couldn't give at the same level.  Also people give me money to do the job I do so this is a way for me to help others like they help me.  I think wealth is badly distributed in the world too and want to help with that where I can.  I heard about Kiva on a website I found called nerdfighters which is partly about trying to make the world a better place. I would also like someone to give me a loan if I needed one and am blessed to live in a country where I could get one if I needed.  I think kiva is a brilliant idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young people in a disadvantaged part of the Scottish city I live in.  We aim to get to know young people and help them to find out about God if they want to.  God has made such huge changes in my life, healing me of illness and of emotional issues and just generally doing so much for me in little and big ways, that I want to let other people know that He is there for them if they want, but I'm still learning so much about Him and how to follow Him myself!  Generally, we want to be available for God to use us to make a positive difference in the lives of young people, their families and the rest of the community.  Mostly, I find in reality that the young people encourage me!  I'm also studying for a degree in Youthwork with Applied Theology.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Someone got me a gift certificate adn I think this is a worthwhile project.  Depending on the details I receive regarding my loan, I may add more.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell my company's services to businesses to help their employees save for retirement.

lenders.name: Svein-Magnus
lenders.loan_because: I believe all entrepreneurs should get a chance to make their world better with their ideas. By lending I therefore hope to make the world better, one entrepreneur at a  time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other businesses to find, adapt and use tools and information in new ways that allow them to do their work better.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: i believe that social responsability and economic development can go hand in hand!
lenders.occupational_info: learning something new everyday!

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.occupational_info:
Besitzer und Gründer einer Mode-Community in Deutschland, in der man selbst eigene Outfits erstellen und die Outfits anderer bewerten kann.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get their businesses going

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: "Money, pardon the expression, is like manure. It's not worth a thing unless it's spread around, encouraging young things to grow. " ~ Hello, Dolly
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently in the most fulfilling job I could imagine - being a mother and wife!  I feel so connected to other mothers and love supporting their dreams for their families through Kiva.

lenders.name: Mari
lenders.occupation: Social Media Leader, Speaker, Trainer & Author
lenders.loan_because: I love making a difference to others, giving fellow entrepreneurs - from all walks of life - the opportunity to get a hand up, not a hand out. I grew up in a remote part of BC, Canada and my family struggled with a small bakery. So now, I especially love helping startup bakeries, cafes, and restaurants.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners grow their business through the power of social networking sites and building relationships both online and offline.

People who can should be helped by who have.
I am bothered by the idea that much of what we perceive as success is dictated by geography not ability. 
The idea that a simple action on my part can create a life changing opportunity is more than reason enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Small Businesses, understand, transition to, and implement Open source software.
